question: If you take my son’s age and multiply it by one and a half times his age you get 24. How old is my son?
I am a father but I don’t have a child nor a wife. Who am I?
You are my sister but I am not your sister but somehow we are siblings. Who am I?
Most people love me very much and can’t wait for my arrival once a year. You may even get mad at me for not giving you what you want. I often hang out at the mall. Who am I?
